item.title: Ranking of Kings (Tamil Dub) - Episode 4 - His First Journey
item.description: A panelist from the Ranking of Kings Committee visits the kingdom to give Daida his ranking. While traveling, Bojji encounters an unusual hunter who teaches him about the mystery of life. While eating around a campfire, an attempt is made on Bojji's life.
item.crunchyroll:episodeTitle: His First Journey

item.title: The Daily Life of the Immortal King (Season 2) (Hindi Dub) - Episode 10 - Extra: The Director Is Not Home Today
item.description: For cultivation prodigy Wang Ling, defeating a demon king at age 6 is nothing compared to fitting in at highschool. And now with supernatural threats on the rise, Wang may have to put his magic studies on hold to save the world!

item.title: Kaguya-sama: Love Is War -The First Kiss That Never Ends- (English Dub) - Episode 3 - Kaguya Wants to Eat It (Ice) / Our Persona / Kaguya Wants to Confess (Ice)
item.description: After she saw Shirogane's bento lunch box during the lunch break, Kaguya tried to tempt him indirectly for a single bite. item.title: Kaguya-sama: Love Is War -The First Kiss That Never Ends- (Spanish Dub) - Episode 4 - Kaguya is Fine with It
item.description: Christmas Eve. Friends and lovers. Everyone spends time in their own way. Shirogane and Kaguya, who joined the Fujiwara Family's Christmas party, enjoyed the Fujiwara Family's brand of hospitality. As the fun time passed quickly, they found themselves on the way home. The two, who cannot express their honest feelings, sit side-by-side on a park bench.
item.crunchyroll:episodeTitle: Kaguya is Fine with It

item.title: Kaguya-sama: Love Is War -The First Kiss That Never Ends- (Portuguese Dub) - Episode 1 - Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Talk Things Over / Miko Iino Wants to Talk / About Kaguya Shinomiya, Part 3
item.description: With the culture festival over and the world dyed in the Christmas mood, Shirogane recalled the kiss on the clock tower, desperately trying to understand Kaguya's true intentions. Kaguya, on the other hand, gleefully told Hayasaka the events. However, the next day, a shrunken Kaguya appeared in the student council room for some reason. While everyone is concerned, a trial begins inside Kaguya's brain!!
item.crunchyroll:episodeTitle: Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Talk Things Over / Miko Iino Wants to Talk / About Kaguya Shinomiya, Part 3

item.title: Kaguya-sama: Love Is War -The First Kiss That Never Ends- (Portuguese Dub) - Episode 2 - About Kaguya Shinomiya, Part 4 / Kaguya Wants to Be Noticed (Ice) / Kaguya Wants to Forgive (Ice)
item.description: Kaguya has frozen her heart as a result of the trial in her brain. Shirogane was unable to hide his turmoil as the Kaguya who stood before him had radically changed from the day before. Shirogane tries to talk to Kaguya to solve the situation. But she runs away, and a chase within the school suddenly begins. Finally, as Shirogane catches up, he shares his thoughts.
